title: My honor is glitching
body: so for the past 5 or 6 games i've been honored every game and i've been getting the honor 5 on the top of my profile when in the loading screen i restarted client and now it says my honor is locked and i have no punishments? it gave me a chest a couple games ago i played and got s- on yasuo got a chest and then 4 key fragments just before that for keeping it sportsmanlike now it's saying my honor is locked? please help

replies.body: It looks like you got hit with a chat restriction which should play out after playing the required games if it hasn't yet. Those restrictions can drop you to rank 0.

i completed my chat restriction then it said i was honor 5 a couple games later and continued to give me the honor 5 boarder at top until i restarted client then it went away again and said it was locked again and it defo did work because it let me get 2x votes for charity
